welcomeText:
# Yo, I'm Bluise - A Nuxt.js & Netlify CMS boilerplate.

Authentic cred hoodie hashtag selfies. Rachlette banjo cardigan cred. Kitsch XOXO lomo polaroid. Knausgaard put a bird on it four dollar toast leggings typewriter asymmetrical.

I like netlify a lot and also vue and nuxt but how do you achieve parsing the markdown we get from netlify into properly formatted html? the doesn't seem to work with netlify CMS output......
seoDescription: A quickstart for Nuxt & Netlify CMS
